Module nl.naturalis.common
Package nl.naturalis.common.io

Class DeflatedNioSwapOutputStream

java.lang.Object
java.io.OutputStream
nl.naturalis.common.io.SwapOutputStream
nl.naturalis.common.io.NioSwapOutputStream
nl.naturalis.common.io.DeflatedNioSwapOutputStream
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, Flushable, AutoCloseable
public class DeflatedNioSwapOutputStream
extends NioSwapOutputStream
A SwapOutputStream that compresses the data as it enters the internal buffer. This will decrease the chance that the internal buffer will have to be swapped out to file. The recall method will uncompress the data again. Clients can continue to write to the DeflatedNioSwapOutputStream even after the data has been recalled. However, once the recall method has been called, data will no longer be compressed as it enters the internal buffer.
Author:
Ayco Holleman
See Also:
SwapOutputStream.recall(OutputStream)

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    DeflatedNioSwapOutputStream​(File swapFile)
    Creates a new DeflatedArraySwapOutputStream with an internal buffer of 64 kB, swapping to the specified file once its internal buffer fills up
    DeflatedNioSwapOutputStream​(File swapFile, int bufSize)
    Creates a new ArraySwapOutputStream with an internal buffer of bufSize bytes, swapping to the specified file once its internal buffer fills up
    DeflatedNioSwapOutputStream​(File swapFile, int bufSize, int compressionLevel)
    Creates a DeflatedArraySwapOutputStream with an internal buffer of treshold bytes, swapping to the specified resource once the buffer overflows.

    void close()
    If the ArraySwapOutputStream has started writing to the swap file, any remaining bytes in the internal buffer will be flushed to it and the output stream to the swap file will be closed.

      public DeflatedNioSwapOutputStream​(File swapFile, int bufSize, int compressionLevel)
      Creates a DeflatedArraySwapOutputStream with an internal buffer of treshold bytes, swapping to the specified resource once the buffer overflows.
      Parameters:
      swapFile - A Supplier of the swap-to outputstream.
      bufSize - The size in bytes of the internal buffer
      compressionLevel - The compression level (0-9)

    • close

      public void close() throws IOException
      Description copied from class: NioSwapOutputStream
      If the ArraySwapOutputStream has started writing to the swap file, any remaining bytes in the internal buffer will be flushed to it and the output stream to the swap file will be closed. Otherwise this method does nothing. Any remaining bytes in the internal buffer will just stay there.
      Specified by:
      close in interface AutoCloseable
      Specified by:
      close in interface Closeable
      Overrides:
      close in class NioSwapOutputStream
      Throws:
      IOException
